questions_and_answers.subject: comfy-easy-grids
questions_and_answers.question: What are the current features of comfy-easy-grids?
questions_and_answers.answer: The current features of comfy-easy-grids include: Create Image Grid, Save Image Grid, Float/Int List, Float/Int List from Text Field, String List, String List from Text Field, Float/Int to Text, and Text Concatenator.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfy-easy-grids
questions_and_answers.question: What is the purpose of the Create Image Grid node?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Create Image Grid node lets you specify a grid size and automatically queues up the full number of prompts required, outputting the current x and y position in the grid with each prompt.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfy-easy-grids
questions_and_answers.question: How does the Save Image Grid node accumulate images?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Save Image Grid node accumulates images until reaching the number specified in its x_size and y_size inputs, then puts them into a grid.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfy-easy-grids
questions_and_answers.question: What is the Float/Int List from Text Field node used for?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Float/Int List from Text Field node allows you to type in a list of numbers manually in case you need more than 6 or find the selection widgets cumbersome.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfy-easy-grids
questions_and_answers.question: What is a possible use for the Text Concatenator node?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Text Concatenator node can be used to adjust your prompt according to the grid indexes.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfy-easy-grids
questions_and_answers.question: What is a recommended resource for turning your grid indexes into math?
questions_and_answers.answer: One recommended resource for turning your grid indexes into math is [ComfyMath](https://github.com/evanspearman/ComfyMath).

questions_and_answers.subject: comfy-easy-grids
questions_and_answers.question: How can I install the comfy-easy-grids extension?
questions_and_answers.answer: To install the comfy-easy-grids extension, you can use the command `cd <ComfyUI repo>/custom_nodes; git clone https://github.com/shockz0rz/comfy-easy-grids.git`.

questions_and_answers.subject: comfy-easy-grids
questions_and_answers.question: What are some future features planned for comfy-easy-grids?
questions_and_answers.answer: Planned future features for comfy-easy-grids include More List-Selector Nodes, String Formatting, more visual feedback, a Z-Axis, and More Accumulator Nodes.
